mapper.select: SELECT users.user_id AS user_id, follow.user_id AS followId, users.nickname AS nickname, follow.nickname AS followNickname, users.avatar AS avatar, follow.avatar AS followAvatar, fans.is_follow, backFans.is_follow as bakcFollow FROM cc_fans fans LEFT JOIN cc_user users ON fans.user_id = users.user_id LEFT JOIN cc_user follow ON fans.follow_user_id = follow.user_id LEFT JOIN cc_fans backFans ON backFans.user_id = fans.follow_user_id and backFans.follow_user_id = fans.user_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
